DOCNAME: CASE OF KIR AND OTHERS v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of P1-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants PERSON , ORG , Mr ORG and PERSON were born in DATE , DATE and DATE respectively and live in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG and Highways expropriated plots of land belonging to the applicants in GPE in order to build a motorway . A committee of experts assessed the value of the plots and the relevant amounts were paid to them when the expropriation took place .

CARDINAL . On DATE , following the applicants’ requests for increased compensation , ORG awarded them an additional compensation of MONEY ( TRL ) plus interest at the statutory rate , applicable at the date of the court ’s decision , running from the date of transfer of title deeds of the plots of land .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG and Highways paid the amount of GPE CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL to the applicants , interest included .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice are set out in the case of ORG v. GPE ( judgment of DATE , Reports of Judgments and Decisions CARDINAL-IV ) .
